name: Cgencore
summary: Become the Crypto Tycoon! The more you click, the richer you get. Your goal is to collect as much Crypto as you can, buy as much tech as you can and conquer the world!

name: CG Mukashi Banashi: Jiisan 2-do Bikkuri!!
summary: CG Mukashi Banashi - Jiisan 2-do Bikkuri!! features 3 different fairy tales with the options for the player like in most of the visual novels, in parts of the story of choose between different possibilities that will leave the story in a way or another, the game as usual in his kind features different endings depending of those choices.

name: CG the Seven Virus Knights
summary:
REMEMBER THE CLASSIC AGE OF RPGS! 
Chinchilla Game the seven virus knights is a classic RPG game with great inspirations from the 16-bit RPGs games! Travel between worlds parodyed with humor and discover the mystery that is involved during the game.

name: CGA Pumpkin Carver
summary: Carve a pumpkin in glorious 4-color CGA

name: CGI: The Game
summary: Step into the shoes of one of 7 real-life body scans of models from today's generation and take on robots aliens & monsters in this futuristic metaverse. Utilizing stunning computer-generated imagery plus a custom soundtrack, the CGI game offers an immersive and action-packed gaming experience.
